â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ Lethis Ã» Path of Progress is an old school 2D city builder set in a     â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ Victorian Steampunk universe called Lethis. You will have to build and  â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ manage cities, provide resources for your inhabitants while making sure â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ there are enough workers to sustain your production lines. Trade with   â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ others cities, honor the requests of the Emperor and make your citizens â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ happy.                                                                  â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ                                                                         â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ History:                                                                â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ With the discovery of condensed steam as a source of energy, the world  â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ of Lethis sees an unprecedented Industrial Revolution. As a result, the â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ Empire enters a period of urbanisation. New cities are built            â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ everywhere. This rural exodus leads to new towns in strategical places  â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ to ensure the growth of the Empire. A time of great change is also a    â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ right time for new discoveries and innovation in science. Cities are    â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ built around great monuments like gigantic zeppelin hangars and         â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ observatories.                                                          â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ                                                                         â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
